document.masterDocTitle: A checklist of the Kateretidae and Nitidulidae of Iran (Coleoptera: Cucujoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A checklist of the Kateretidae and Nitidulidae of Iran (Coleoptera: Cucujoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Meligethes ponticus Jelínek, 1982
.

Distribution within Iran .
Northern Iran (no locality cited) (Jelínek 1982 b; Audisio 1993 a; Audisio et al . 2000 ).
Distribution outside Iran .
Georgia , Russia , Turkey .

Distribution within Iran .
Mazandaran, Tehran (Audisio & De Biase 1999 ; Audisio et al . 2000 ).
Distribution outside Iran .
Holarctic.

Material examined. Yazd, Kharanaq, 60 km NE Yazd, 9 .
v. 2010, 2
spec., lgt. et coll. K. Orszulik.
Distribution within Iran .
East Azarbaijan, Kerman, Tehran (Jelínek 1981 ; Audisio et al . 2000 ), Fars (Audisio et al . 2000 ).

Distribution outside Iran .
Afghanistan , Albania , Armenia , Austria , Azerbaijan , Belarus , Bosnia Herzegovina , Bulgaria , Croatia , Cyprus , Czech Republic , France , Germany , Greece , Hungary , Iraq , Israel , Italy , Jordan , Kyrgyzstan , Lebanon , Macedonia , Moldavia , Poland , Russia , Serbia and Montenegro , Slovakia , Slovenia , Spain , Switzerland , Syria , Tajikistan , Turkey , Turkmenistan , Ukraine , Uzbekistan .

Meligethes dives Reitter, 1872
.

Distribution within Iran .
Northern Iran (no locality cited) (Kirejtshuk 1977 ; Jelínek 1981 under
M. opacus Rosenhauer
; Audisio 1993 b; Audisio et al . 2000 ).

Distribution outside Iran .
Albania , Andorra , Armenia , Austria , Azerbaijan , Belgium , Bosnia Herzegovina , Bulgaria , Croatia , Czech Republic , France , Georgia , Germany , Greece , Hungary , Italy , Kazakhstan , Macedonia , Moldavia , Poland , Romania , Russia , Serbia and Montenegro , Slovakia , Slovenia , Spain , Switzerland , the Netherlands , Turkey , Ukraine .

Meligethes tschistyakovae Kirejtshuk, 1990
;
Meligethes yakushenkoi Kirejtshuk, 1992
.

Distribution within Iran .
Iran (no locality cited) (Jelínek & Audisio 2007 ).

Distribution outside Iran .
Armenia , Azerbaijan , Georgia , Kazakhstan , Russia , Turkey , Turkmenistan .

Distribution within Iran .
Iran (no locality cited) (Jelínek & Audisio 2007 ).
Distribution outside Iran .
Holarctic.

Distribution within Iran .
Iran (no locality cited) (Jelínek & Audisio 2007 ).

Distribution outside Iran .
Albania , Andorra , Armenia , Austria , Belarus , Belgium , Bosnia Herzegovina , Bulgaria , Croatia , Czech Republic , Estonia , Finland , France , Georgia , Germany , Great Britain , Greece , Hungary , Ireland , Italy , Jordan , Latvia , Lebanon , Lithuania , Luxembourg , Macedonia , Moldavia , Norway , Poland , Portugal , Romania , Russia , Serbia and Montenegro , Slovakia , Slovenia , Spain , Sweden , Switzerland , Syria , the Netherlands , Turkey , Ukraine .

Distribution within Iran .
East Azarbaijan (Audisio et al . 2000 ).
Distribution outside Iran .
Syria , Turkey .

Distribution within Iran .
Golestan (Jelínek 1982 a; Audisio 1988 ; Audisio et al . 2000 ).
Distribution outside Iran .
Armenia , Azerbaijan , Georgia , Russia , Turkey .

Material examined. West Azarbaijan, Ourmieh ( 1384 m ), 2 spec.,
August 2008
, leg. N. Samin, dep. SRIAU. New Iranian record.

Distribution outside Iran .
Albania , Andorra , Armenia , Austria , Belarus , Belgium , Bosnia Herzegovina , Bulgaria , Croatia , Czech Republic , France , Georgia , Germany , Great Britain , Greece , Hungary , Ireland , Italy , Liechtenstein , Luxembourg , Macedonia , Moldavia , Poland , Portugal , Romania , Russia , Serbia and Montenegro , Slovakia , Slovenia , Spain , Sweden , Switzerland , the Netherlands , Turkey , Ukraine .

Meligethes letzneri Reitter, 1873
.

M . brunnicornis
).

Isfahan (Sakenin et al . 2008 a).

Albania , Armenia , Bulgaria , Georgia , Greece , Israel , Italy , Jordan , Macedonia , Serbia and Montenegro , Syria , Turkey .

Armenia , Azerbaijan , Georgia , Russia , Turkey .
